titles.title: Providing for a committee to notify the President of completion of business.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 311, H. Res. 320 is considered passed House.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 311.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/9/1997--Introduced. Provides for appointment of a committee of two Members of the House of Representatives to inform the President that the House has completed its business of the session and is ready to adjourn.
